org.soulwing.jdbc.source

Interface SQLSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReaderSQLSource, ResourceSQLSource, StringSQLSource

    public interface SQLSource
extends Closeable, AutoCloseable
    A source of SQL statements.

    An instance of this type abstracts the details of reading the text of an SQL source file and parsing it into a sequence of statements.

    Author:
    Carl Harris

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String next()
      Gets the next statement from this source.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable
